org.apache.flink.runtime.state.memory

类 MemCheckpointStreamFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.memory.MemCheckpointStreamFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CheckpointStreamFactory

    public class MemCheckpointStreamFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements CheckpointStreamFactory
    CheckpointStreamFactory that produces streams that write to in-memory byte arrays.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  MemCheckpointStreamFactory.MemoryCheckpointOutputStream
      A CheckpointStateOutputStream that writes into a byte array.

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.flink.runtime.state.CheckpointStreamFactory

        CheckpointStreamFactory.CheckpointStateOutputStream

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private int maxStateSize
      The maximal size that the snapshotted memory state may have

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MemCheckpointStreamFactory(int maxStateSize)
      Creates a new in-memory stream factory that accepts states whose serialized forms are up to the given number of bytes.

    • 方法概要

      • maxStateSize

        private final int maxStateSize
        The maximal size that the snapshotted memory state may have

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MemCheckpointStreamFactory

        public MemCheckpointStreamFactory(int maxStateSize)
        Creates a new in-memory stream factory that accepts states whose serialized forms are up to the given number of bytes.
        参数:
        maxStateSize - The maximal size of the serialized state

    • 方法详细资料

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointStreamFactory
        Closes the stream factory, releasing all internal resources, but does not delete any persistent checkpoint data.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 CheckpointStreamFactory
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions can be forwarded and will be logged by the system

      • createCheckpointStateOutputStream

        public CheckpointStreamFactory.CheckpointStateOutputStream createCheckpointStateOutputStream(long checkpointID,
                                                                                             long timestamp)
                                                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointStreamFactory
        Creates an new CheckpointStreamFactory.CheckpointStateOutputStream. When the stream is closed, it returns a state handle that can retrieve the state back.
        指定者:
        createCheckpointStateOutputStream 在接口中 CheckpointStreamFactory
        参数:
        checkpointID - The ID of the checkpoint.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the checkpoint.
        返回:
        An output stream that writes state for the given checkpoint.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions may occur while creating the stream and should be forwarded.
